cfClassScheme.cfDescr: This scheme contains CERIF vocabulary terms applicable in the cfEquipment_Classification, cfService_Classification, cfFacility_Classification link entities, being thus infrastructure types.

cfClass.cfDescr: A distributed RI is constituted by geographically distributed implementations/facilities but managed by a single body.
